# nlmixr2est: The core estimation routines for nlmixr2

The goal of nlmixr2est is to provide the nlmixr2 core estimation
routines.

## Installation

You can install the development version of nlmixr2est from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("nlmixr2/rxode2")
remotes::install_github("nlmixr2/nlmixr2data")
remotes::install_github("nlmixr2/lotri")
remotes::install_github("nlmixr2/nlmixr2est")
```

For most people, using nlmixr2 directly would be likely easier.

``` r
library(nlmixr2est)
#> Loading required package: nlmixr2data

## The basic model consists of an ini block that has initial estimates
one.compartment <- function() {
  ini({
    tka <- 0.45; label("Ka")
    tcl <- 1; label("Cl")
    tv <- 3.45; label("V")
    eta.ka ~ 0.6
    eta.cl ~ 0.3
    eta.v ~ 0.1
    add.sd <- 0.7
  })
  # and a model block with the error specification and model specification
  model({
    ka <- exp(tka + eta.ka)
    cl <- exp(tcl + eta.cl)
    v <- exp(tv + eta.v)
    d/dt(depot) = -ka * depot
    d/dt(center) = ka * depot - cl / v * center
    cp = center / v
    cp ~ add(add.sd)
  })
}

## The fit is performed by the function nlmixr/nlmixr2 specifying the model, data and estimate
fit <- nlmixr2(one.compartment, theo_sd,  est="saem", saemControl(print=0))
#> ℹ parameter labels from comments are typically ignored in non-interactive mode
#> ℹ Need to run with the source intact to parse comments
#> → loading into symengine environment...
#> → pruning branches (`if`/`else`) of saem model...
#> ✔ done
#> → finding duplicate expressions in saem model...
#> [====|====|====|====|====|====|====|====|====|====] 0:00:00
#> → optimizing duplicate expressions in saem model...
#> [====|====|====|====|====|====|====|====|====|====] 0:00:00
#> ✔ done
#> → creating rxode2 include directory
#> → getting R compile options
#> → precompiling headers
#> ✔ done
#> using C compiler: 'gcc.exe (GCC) 14.2.0'
#> ℹ calculate uninformed etas
#> ℹ done
#> rxode2 3.0.4.9000 using 8 threads (see ?getRxThreads)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'rxode2'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:nlmixr2est':
#> 
#>     boxCox, yeoJohnson
#> Calculating covariance matrix
#> → loading into symengine environment...
#> → pruning branches (`if`/`else`) of saem model...
#> ✔ done
#> → finding duplicate expressions in saem predOnly model 0...
#> → finding duplicate expressions in saem predOnly model 1...
#> → optimizing duplicate expressions in saem predOnly model 1...
#> → finding duplicate expressions in saem predOnly model 2...
#> ✔ done
#> using C compiler: 'gcc.exe (GCC) 14.2.0'
#> → Calculating residuals/tables
#> ✔ done
#> → compress origData in nlmixr2 object, save 5952
#> → compress phiM in nlmixr2 object, save 63504
#> → compress parHistData in nlmixr2 object, save 13928
#> → compress saem0 in nlmixr2 object, save 30208

# Since the fit is performed in `nlmixr2est` this code works
print(fit)
#> ── nlmixr² SAEM OBJF by FOCEi approximation ──
#> 
#>  Gaussian/Laplacian Likelihoods: AIC() or $objf etc. 
#>  FOCEi CWRES & Likelihoods: addCwres() 
#> 
#> ── Time (sec $time): ──
#> 
#>         setup covariance  saem table compress other
#> elapsed 0.003       0.02 16.55  0.14     0.03 6.027
#> 
#> ── Population Parameters ($parFixed or $parFixedDf): ──
#> 
#>        Parameter  Est.     SE %RSE Back-transformed(95%CI) BSV(CV%) Shrink(SD)%
#> tka           Ka 0.464  0.195   42       1.59 (1.09, 2.33)     71.1   -0.0900% 
#> tcl           Cl  1.01  0.085 8.43       2.74 (2.32, 3.24)     27.4      4.80% 
#> tv             V  3.46 0.0447 1.29         31.7 (29, 34.6)     13.1      8.77% 
#> add.sd           0.696                               0.696                     
#>  
#>   Covariance Type ($covMethod): linFim
#>   No correlations in between subject variability (BSV) matrix
#>   Full BSV covariance ($omega) or correlation ($omegaR; diagonals=SDs) 
#>   Distribution stats (mean/skewness/kurtosis/p-value) available in $shrink 
#>   Censoring ($censInformation): No censoring
#> 
#> ── Fit Data (object is a modified tibble): ──
#> # A tibble: 132 × 19
#>   ID     TIME    DV  PRED    RES IPRED   IRES  IWRES eta.ka eta.cl   eta.v    cp
#>   <fct> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 1      0     0.74  0     0.74   0     0.74   1.06  0.0839 -0.477 -0.0849  0   
#> 2 1      0.25  2.84  3.28 -0.437  3.83 -0.991 -1.42  0.0839 -0.477 -0.0849  3.83
#> 3 1      0.57  6.57  5.86  0.715  6.76 -0.194 -0.278 0.0839 -0.477 -0.0849  6.76
#> # ℹ 129 more rows
#> # ℹ 7 more variables: depot <dbl>, center <dbl>, ka <dbl>, cl <dbl>, v <dbl>,
#> #   tad <dbl>, dosenum <dbl>

# But plots are in the helper package `nlmixr2plot`, and therefore:
plot(fit)
```

![](reference/figures/README-example-1.png)

``` r
# does not give the standard goodness of fit plots
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`addCwres()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/addCwres.md)
  : Add CWRES
- [`addNpde()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/addNpde.md)
  : NPDE calculation for nlmixr2
- [`addTable()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/addTable.md)
  : Add table information to nlmixr2 fit object without tables
- [`agqControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/agqControl.md)
  : Control options for the agq estimation method
- [`assertNlmixrFit()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/assertNlmixrFit.md)
  : Assert that this is a nlmixr2 fit object
- [`assertNlmixrFitData()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/assertNlmixrFitData.md)
  : Assert that this is a nlmixr2 fit data object
- [`bobyqaControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/bobyqaControl.md)
  : Control for bobyqa estimation method in nlmixr2
- [`boxCox()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/boxCox.md)
  [`iBoxCox()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/boxCox.md)
  [`yeoJohnson()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/boxCox.md)
  [`iYeoJohnson()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/boxCox.md)
  : Cox Box, Yeo Johnson and inverse transformation
- [`cholSE()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/cholSE.md)
  : Generalized Cholesky Matrix Decomposition
- [`.augPredIpredModel()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/dot-augPredIpredModel.md)
  : Augment Prediction for Ipred Model
- [`.nlmixr0preProcessCovariatesPresent()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/dot-nlmixr0preProcessCovariatesPresent.md)
  : Preprocess Covariates needed (or other data items)
- [`.nlmixrPreprocessLiteralFix()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/dot-nlmixrPreprocessLiteralFix.md)
  : This literally fixes parameters in the model
- [`.preProcessDataUi()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/dot-preProcessDataUi.md)
  : Preprocess the zero omegas
- [`.preProcessZeroOmega()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/dot-preProcessZeroOmega.md)
  : Preprocess the zero omegas
- [`foControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/foControl.md)
  : Control options for the FO estimation method
- [`foceControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/foceControl.md)
  : Control options for the foce estimation method
- [`foceiControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/foceiControl.md)
  : Control Options for FOCEi
- [`foiControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/foiControl.md)
  : Control options foir the FOI estimation method
- [`getValidNlmixrControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/getValidNlmixrControl.md)
  [`getValidNlmixrCtl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/getValidNlmixrControl.md)
  : Get valid nlmixr control object
- [`laplaceControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/laplaceControl.md)
  : Control options for the Laplace estimation method
- [`lbfgsb3cControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/lbfgsb3cControl.md)
  : Control for lbfgsb3c estimation method in nlmixr2
- [`n1qn1Control()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/n1qn1Control.md)
  : Control for n1qn1 estimation method in nlmixr2
- [`newuoaControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/newuoaControl.md)
  : Control for newuoa estimation method in nlmixr2
- [`nlmControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmControl.md)
  : nlmixr2 defaults controls for nlm
- [`nlminbControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlminbControl.md)
  : nlmixr2 nlminb defaults
- [`nlmixr2()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2.md)
  [`nlmixr()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2.md)
  : nlmixr2 fits population PK and PKPD non-linear mixed effects models.
- [`nlmixr2AllEst()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2AllEst.md)
  : Show all the current estimation methods
- [`nlmixr2AugPredSolve()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2AugPredSolve.md)
  [`augPred(`*`<nlmixr2FitData>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2AugPredSolve.md)
  : Augmented Prediction for nlmixr2 fit
- [`nlmixr2CreateOutputFromUi()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2CreateOutputFromUi.md)
  : Create nlmixr output from the UI
- [`nlmixr2Est()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Est.md)
  : Generic for nlmixr2 estimation methods
- [`nlmixr2Gill83()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Gill83.md)
  : Get the optimal forward difference interval by Gill83 method
- [`nlmixr2Hess()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Hess.md)
  : Calculate Hessian
- [`nlmixr2Keywords`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Keywords.md)
  : A list and description of the fields in the nlmxir2 object
- [`nlmixr2Logo()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Logo.md)
  : Messages the nlmixr2 logo...
- [`nlmixr2NlmeControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2NlmeControl.md)
  [`nlmeControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2NlmeControl.md)
  : Control Values for nlme Fit with extra options for nlmixr
- [`nlmixr2Validate()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Validate.md)
  [`nmTest()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Validate.md)
  : Validate nlmixr2
- [`nlmixr2Version()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2Version.md)
  : Display nlmixr2's version
- [`nlmixr2fix()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixr2fix.md)
  : Try to fix a nlmixr2 fit
- [`nlmixrAddObjectiveFunctionDataFrame()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixrAddObjectiveFunctionDataFrame.md)
  : Add objective function data frame to the current objective function
- [`nlmixrAddTiming()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixrAddTiming.md)
  : Manually add time to a nlmixr2 object
- [`nlmixrCbind()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixrCbind.md)
  : nlmixrCbind
- [`nlmixrClone()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixrClone.md)
  : Clone nlmixr environment
- [`nlmixrWithTiming()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlmixrWithTiming.md)
  : Time a part of a nlmixr operation and add to nlmixr object
- [`nlsControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nlsControl.md)
  : nlmixr2 defaults controls for nls
- [`nmNearPD()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmNearPD.md)
  : C++ implementation of Matrix's nearPD
- [`nmObjGetControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetControl.md)
  : Get control object from fit
- [`nmObjGetEstimationModel()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetEstimationModel.md)
  : Get the estimation model for a fit object depending on the object
  type
- [`nmObjGetFoceiControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetFoceiControl.md)
  : Method for getting focei compatible control object from nlmixr
  object
- [`nmObjGetIpredModel()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetIpredModel.md)
  [`nmObjGetEstimationModel(`*`<saem>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetIpredModel.md)
  [`nmObjGetEstimationModel(`*`<default>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetIpredModel.md)
  : Get the ipred model for a fit object depending on the object type
- [`nmObjGetPredOnly()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjGetPredOnly.md)
  : Get the pred-only model for a fit depending on the object type
- [`nmObjHandleControlObject()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjHandleControlObject.md)
  : Handle the control object
- [`nmObjHandleModelObject()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjHandleModelObject.md)
  : Handle Model Object
- [`nmObjUiSetCompressed()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmObjUiSetCompressed.md)
  : Set if the nlmixr2 object will return a compressed ui
- [`nmsimplex()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/nmsimplex.md)
  : Nelder-Mead simplex search
- [`ofv()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/ofv.md) :
  Return the objective function
- [`optimControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/optimControl.md)
  : nlmixr2 optim defaults
- [`posthocControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/posthocControl.md)
  : Control options for the posthoc estimation method
- [`predict(`*`<nlmixr2FitCore>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/predict.nlmixr2FitCore.md)
  : Predict method for nlmixr2 fit core objects
- [`print(`*`<saemFit>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/print.saemFit.md)
  : Print an SAEM model fit summary
- [`residuals(`*`<nlmixr2FitData>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/residuals.nlmixr2FitData.md)
  : Extract residuals from the FOCEI fit
- [`rmEta()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/rmEta.md) :
  Remove an eta from the model
- [`saemControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/saemControl.md)
  : Control Options for SAEM
- [`setCov()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/setCov.md)
  : Set the covariance type based on prior calculated covariances
- [`setOfv()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/setOfv.md)
  [`getOfvType()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/setOfv.md)
  : Set/get Objective function type for a nlmixr2 object
- [`sqrtm()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/sqrtm.md) :
  Return the square root of general square matrix A
- [`summary(`*`<saemFit>`*`)`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/summary.saemFit.md)
  : Print an SAEM model fit summary
- [`tableControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/tableControl.md)
  : Output table/data.frame options
- [`uobyqaControl()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/uobyqaControl.md)
  : Control for uobyqa estimation method in nlmixr2
- [`vpcSim()`](https://nlmixr2.github.io/nlmixr2est/reference/vpcSim.md)
  : VPC simulation
